direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create new orders but with different types (OCO vs. single order).
Both methods involve order management with similar parameter checks and request handling.
Both methods handle order-related operations and manage similar exceptions.
Both methods manage OCO orders, allowing test cases for one to be applied to the other.
Both methods access and manipulate OCO order data with similar control flows.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API interactions.
Environment setup is required before placing OCO orders.
Both methods verify order responses and handle similar exceptions.
